data.title: Top 60 German News Websites in 2024
data.meta_description: German news Website Best List. Get latest news from German newspapers, German news online, deutsche news, German english newspapers by following top German news sites.
data.meta_site_name: FeedSpot for Journalists, Editors and Reporters
data.text:
1. deutschland.de

DEUTSCHLAND.de aims to present a comprehensive, modern and topical picture of Germany abroad. DEUTSCHLAND.de offers news on politics, economics, culture, environment, knowledge and life.

Media Outlet deutschland.de

Facebook Followers 2.6MTwitter Followers 41.5KInstagram Followers 401.9K Frequency 5 posts / week Domain Authority 74 TypeNews WebsiteFormatDigitalLanguageEnglishOwner(s)Fazit Communication GmbHHeadquartersPariser Straße 1, D-60486 Frankfurt am Main, GermanyFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/deutschland.de/Xhttps://twitter.com/de_deutschland?lang=enInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/deutschland_de/?hl=enMastheadEditors-in-chief : Arnd Festerling

Managing Directors : Jonas Grashey, Hannes Ludwig

Content-Management : Anabell Krebs, Stefan Reichart, Viktoria Vieweg

We'll share active media list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. DER SPIEGEL

SPIEGEL ONLINE provides daily news, analysis and opinion from Europe's leading news magazine and Germany's top news Web site.

Media Outlet spiegel.de

Facebook Followers 1.6MTwitter Followers 454.5K Frequency 3 posts / week Domain Authority 93 TypeWeekly MagazineFormatPrint/DigitalLanguageGermanFounded4 January 1947Founder(s)Rudolf AugsteinOwner(s)Spiegel-VerlagHeadquartersEricusspitze 1, 20457 HamburgFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/derspiegelXhttps://twitter.com/derspiegelLinkedInhttps://www.linkedin.com/company/der-spiegel/MastheadEditors-in-chief : Steffen Klusmann

Members of Chief Editorial Board : Thorsten Dörting, Juliane von Mittelstaedt, Oliver Trenkamp, Stefan Weigel, Susanne Amann, Birger Menke, Jörn Sucher

Executive Management : DER SPIEGEL GmbH & Co. KG, Thomas Hass, Stefan Ottlitz

Show More

3. ZEIT ONLINE

Find breaking news, analysis, reviews and opinion on politics, business, culture about Germany from ZEIT ONLINE in English.

Media Outlet zeit.de

Facebook Followers 819.1KTwitter Followers 2.6MInstagram Followers 1.1M Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 91 TypeDaily NewspaperFormatBroadsheet/DigitalLanguageGermanFounded21 February 1946Founder(s)Gerd BuceriusOwner(s)Zeit-VerlagHeadquartersBuceriusstraße, 20095 HamburgFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/diezeitXhttps://twitter.com/zeitonlineYoutubehttps://www.youtube.com/user/zeitonlineShow More

4. The Local Germany

The Local Germany provides the latest news from Germany.

Media Outlet thelocal.de

Facebook Followers 180.5KTwitter Followers 40.6KInstagram Followers 7.1K Frequency 3 posts / day Domain Authority 83 TypeOnline NewspaperFormatDigitalLanguageEnglishFounded2004Founder(s)Paul RapacioliOwner(s)The Local Europe ABHeadquartersSingerstrasse 109, 10179 BerlinFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/thelocalgermanyXhttps://twitter.com/thelocalgermanyInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/thelocalgermany/MastheadCEO & Publisher : James Savage

5. Bundes Regierung

The German Federal Government website provides the latest updates on government policies, initiatives, and statements. It covers national and international affairs, speeches, and activities of the Chancellor and other government officials. The section aims to keep the public informed about governmental decisions and their implications.

Media Outlet bundesregierung.de

Facebook Followers 1.1MTwitter Followers 911.9K Frequency 17 posts / day Domain Authority 78

6. MunichNOW

Munich NOW brings you Munich news headlines, sports, opinions, culture, and articles on life in Munich and Bavaria - all in English - for locals and expatriates.

Media Outlet munichnow.com

Facebook Followers 5.7KTwitter Followers 549Instagram Followers 568 Domain Authority 28 TypeOnline NewspaperFormatDigitalLanguageEnglishOwner(s)StröerHeadquartersMunichInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/munichnow/Show More

7. Reuters » Germany

Reuters' Germany section provides the latest news and in-depth reports on political, economic, and social issues in Germany. It covers topics such as economic performance, government policies, industry developments, and significant events. The section also features updates on Germany's role in international affairs, business trends, and societal changes, offering comprehensive coverage to keep readers informed.

Media Outlet reuters.com

Facebook Followers 7.3MTwitter Followers 25.7MInstagram Followers 5M Domain Authority 94 TypeNews AgencyFormatDigitalLanguageEnglishFoundedOctober 1, 1851Founder(s)Paul Julius ReuterOwner(s)Thomson ReutersHeadquarters30 South Colonnade, Canary Wharf, London E14 5EPNews Tipstips@reuters.comAdvertisement Inquirieshttps://www.reutersprofessional.com/advertising-solutions/Phone1-347-509-6837Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/ReutersXhttps://twitter.com/reutersInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/reuters/MastheadPresident : Paul Bascobert

8. t-online

At t-online.de you will find a lot of information and reports on politics as well as further reports

Media Outlet t-online.de

Domain Authority 92 TypeOnline PortalFormatDigitalLanguageGermanFounded1 April 1995Founder(s)Deutsche TelekomOwner(s)Ströer Content GroupHeadquartersTorstraße 49, 10119 BerlinFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/tonlineXhttps://twitter.com/tonlineInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/tonline/Youtubehttps://www.youtube.com/user/tonlineShow More

9. Stuttgarter Nachrichten

Our website delivers the latest news from Stuttgart, Baden-Württemberg, and the world. Here you can find all the important information about Stuttgart and the region, Stuttgart 21, VfB Stuttgart, and much more. Stuttgarter Nachrichten is a local independent and widely read newspaper covering Stuttgart and neighboring region.

Media Outlet stuttgarter-nachrichten.de

Facebook Followers 122.8KTwitter Followers 43.6KInstagram Followers 71.4K Frequency 10 posts / month Domain Authority 76 TypeDaily NewspaperFormatPrint/DigitalLanguageGermanFounded12 June 1946Founder(s)Karl AckermannOwner(s)Südwestdeutsche Medien HoldingHeadquartersPlieninger Str. 150, 70567 StuttgartFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/stuttgarternachrichtenInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/stuttgarternachrichten/MastheadEditor-in-chief : Dr. Christoph Reisinger

Head of Digital/Content : Johanna Bruckner

Deputy Editor-in-Chief : Rainer Feuerstein

Head of title team : Rainer Feuerstein

Art director : Dirk Steiniger

Berlin editor : Tobias Peter

Show More

10. Kieler Nachrichten

Kieler Nachrichten offers a direct, informative, and balanced perspective of Kiel city with timely and accurate news coverage, Featuring the latest updates on Police, War, Germany, Regional Sports, and more current topics. We also have dedicated sections for Health, Christmas and Family.

Media Outlet kn-online.de

Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 76

11. euronews » Germany

Explore live news updates from Germany and in-depth analysis of current events. Stay up-to-date and informed with opinions, comparisons, and discussions on critical topics here on our digital portal. Euro News is a multimedia news outlet that provides news and information about Europe and the world.

Media Outlet euronews.com

Facebook Followers 2.2MTwitter Followers 584KInstagram Followers 638.5K Frequency 9 posts / week Domain Authority 92 TypeTelivision News NetworkFormatDigital, TV NewsLanguageEnglishFoundedJanuary 1, 1993Owner(s)Euronews SAHeadquartersLyon, FrancePress Inquiriespressoffice@euronews.comFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/euronewsXhttps://twitter.com/euronewsInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/euronews.tv/Youtubehttps://www.youtube.com/euronewsLinkedInhttps://www.linkedin.com/company/euronewsShow More

12. DW

News, off-beat stories, and analysis of German and international affairs. Dive deeper with our features from Europe and beyond. Deutsche Welle (DW) is Germany's international broadcaster and one of the most successful and relevant international media outlets, providing journalistic content in several languages worldwide.

Media Outlet dw.com

Facebook Followers 3.2MTwitter Followers 728.8KInstagram Followers 846.7K Frequency 24 posts / month Domain Authority 93 TypeBroadcasting NewsFormatDigital, TV NewsLanguageGerman, English, Spanish, Hindi, Persian, and ArabicFoundedMay 3, 1953Owner(s)Federal Government of GermanyHeadquartersBonn, GermanyNews Tipstips@dw.comLegal Team Emailinfo@dw.comPhone+49.228.429 - 0Facebookhttps://facebook.com/deutschewelleXhttps://x.com/DeutscheWelleInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/dw.communicationsLinkedInhttps://de.linkedin.com/company/deutsche-welleShow More

13. JUNGE FREIHEIT

Junge Freiheit is a German weekly newspaper that is known for its far-right, nationalist, and conservative perspective. Browse weekly news, discussion, and strong opinions on current on our website.

Media Outlet jungefreiheit.de

Frequency 8 posts / day Domain Authority 63

14. German Brief

German Brief was conceived to report on, discuss, and explain German affairs. It covers a broad range of topics that are of interest and consequence to an international audience. German Brief values facts over speculation. While individual articles may express particular opinions, overall, the German Brief does not favor one cause over another.

Media Outlet germanbrief.com

Frequency 1 post / week Domain Authority 6

15. t-Online

Browse the latest Top Stories, Sports, and Current News from Germany. t-Online is your go-to source for reliable information and engaging content across all digital platforms. Whether you're looking for the latest headlines, in-depth analysis, videos, podcasts or unmissable viral content, t-online.de has you covered.

Media Outlet t-online.co

Frequency 30 posts / month Domain Authority 1

16. taz

Taz, short for Tagezeitiung, is a left-leaning newspaper in Germany known for its investigative reporting and in-depth analysis of current events and issues. Dive into Critical, independent journalism from the left wing with analyses, background information, comments, interviews, and reports.

Media Outlet taz.de

Frequency 22 posts / day Domain Authority 83

17. Tagesspiegel

Der Tagesspiegel is a German daily newspaper. It has regional correspondent offices in Washington D.C. and Potsdam. Here on our online platform, you will find, Current news from Berlin, news from Germany and the world, comments, background information, and interviews from politics, business, and Berlin.

Media Outlet tagesspiegel.de

Frequency 5 posts / week Domain Authority 93

18. Abendzeitung

Here you will find everything about TSV 1860 and FC Bayern Munich, fascinating pictures from Munich, Bavaria, Germany, and the world, exciting videos, and of course everything important from the fields of politics, sports, entertainment, people, region, panorama, and culture. The Abendzeitung is a German-language newspaper based in Munich, Germany.

Media Outlet abendzeitung-muenchen.de

Facebook Followers 70.9KTwitter Followers 58.5KInstagram Followers 16.2K Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 81

19. FOCUS online

FOCUS Online presents up-to-the-minute news and service information from Germany's modern news magazine. Established in 1996, FOCUS is an online news brand offering a one-stop browsing spot for all the latest news covering the world. From Politics, Science to Lifestyle and Family, we cover everything here.

Media Outlet focus.de

Facebook Followers 901.3KTwitter Followers 722.1K Frequency 13 posts / day Domain Authority 92

20. Lübecker Nachrichten

Stay up-to-date on Lubeck city with news and information from Lübeck, the region & Schleswig-Holstein as well as from politics, business, sports, culture, entertainment, and advice. Lübecker Nachrichten is a primary news source for the local community in Lubeck. The paper is published in print as well as updated online throughout the day.

Media Outlet ln-online.de

Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 77

21. Express

Associated with the local daily Express, EXPRESS.de is the mouthpiece of the Rhineland. With us, you get all the news and stories that move people from Cologne and the surrounding area. Our website is updated frequently with new articles and other content, and it also includes interactive features such as forums and blogs.

Media Outlet express.de

Facebook Followers 254.5KTwitter Followers 138.7K Frequency 13 posts / month Domain Authority 81

22. Berliner Morgenpost

Berliner Morgenpost Online edition brings you the latest news and background information from politics, business, and sport from Berlin, Germany, and the world. Berliner Morgenpost is a local newspaper in Berlin.

Media Outlet morgenpost.de

Facebook Followers 274.7KTwitter Followers 305.5KInstagram Followers 83.8K Frequency 8 posts / week Domain Authority 78

23. Ostsee Zeitung

The Digital destination for all up-to-date news and information about events and issues in the community served by the Ostsee Zeitung newspaper. Read Current news and information from Rostock, as well as from politics, business, sports, culture, and entertainment. Ostsee Zeitung is a local news publication providing coverage of major events in the area.

Media Outlet ostsee-zeitung.de

Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 71

24. Handelsblatt

Innovations from technology, IT, telecommunications, research, medicine, energy and the environment. Read up-to-the-minute technology news on Handelsblatt Online. Handelsblatt is Germany's leading newspaper which covers topics such as finance, technology, politics and much more.

Media Outlet handelsblatt.com

Facebook Followers 345.4KTwitter Followers 398.6K Frequency 21 posts / day Domain Authority 89

25. Oberhessische Presse

Discover trending stories news and information from Marburg, the surrounding region, and Hesse as well as from politics, business, sports, culture, entertainment, and opinions. Oberhessische Presse is a daily newspaper that offers local news coverage, as well as coverage of national and international news.

Media Outlet op-marburg.de

Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 58

26. Süddeutsche Zeitung

Süddeutsche Zeitung Online provides News updates from Germany and all over the world with comments and background reports. Süddeutsche Zeitung is one of the largest newspapers published in Germany. It is widely respected for its comprehensive coverage of local and nationally relevant issues.

Media Outlet sueddeutsche.de

Facebook Followers 771.4KTwitter Followers 1.9MInstagram Followers 805.4K Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 91

27. Kölner Stadt-Anzeiger

The 'Kölner Stadt-Anzeiger' is among the most demanding and well-stocked regional newspapers in Germany. On ksta.de, you will find digital and extended versions of articles and additional news content covering Politics, Business, Sports, Art & Entertainment from the Kologne region.

Media Outlet ksta.de

Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 83

28. Berliner Tageszeitung

Get news and updates around the clock in four languages: German, English, Spanish and French - information from politics, business, and sport, from Germany and all over the world. Berliner Tageszeitung is a daily news publication committed to direct, fair, and accurate coverage of current German and World affairs

Media Outlet berlinertageszeitung.de

Twitter Followers 346 Frequency 10 posts / week Domain Authority 39

29. Augsburger Allgemeine

Published by the Augsburger Verlagsgesellschaft mbH, Augsburger Allgemeineand covers news and information about the region of Augsburg and the surrounding area. Their website features news, pictures, and videos from Augsburg, Bavaria, Germany, and the world as well as from the fields of economy, politics, culture, sports, and celebrities.

Media Outlet augsburger-allgemeine.de

Frequency 17 posts / month Domain Authority 87

30. Badische Zeitung

A trusted source for local news from Freiburg, Germany, Badische Zeitung is an excellent news and Information hub for the city and the rest of and southern Baden. Discover breaking news, opinions, and editorials. videos, photos, events, and advertising markets in our online feed.

Media Outlet badische-zeitung.de

Frequency 7 posts / month Domain Authority 82
